title: The Solar System
creator_credit: National Geographic Society and Lothar Wolff Productions
brief_description: This video explores the answer to the question: What is our place in the universe. Using modern Astronomical equipment it provides a introductory examination of the Milky Way, explaining the features of the Sun, Earth and our neighbouring planets, as well as the matter that makes up the rest of the universe. Suitable for Upper Primary-Lower Secondary level students.
